page.title: 03BRACKFIELD BAWN
page.content: Many years ago people used to live in Brackfield Bawn. The Bawn was built by the{Skinners Comany}as a {stronghold.}Now a church stands there The Bawn is mostly knocked down now people find old bits of pottery underneath the ground. The fireplace used to be in the wall there was also a watermill near it.People used to walk back and forwards to it every day It used to be a very big Bawn until it got knocked down. The kitchen used to be in one corner.There used to be sheds standing against the walls. It was built of stone.
